passage_text: Shoe Carnival-CLOSED Christmas Day. Most Shoe Carnival stores will be closed on Christmas Day, December 25. Shoe Carnival will resume normal hours on December 26 to kick off their after Christmas and New Years sales. Shoe Carnival will also close early on Christmas Eve, December 24 at most locations. Stores may be open limited hours on New Years Eve and/or New Years Day. Again, most Shoe Carnival stores will be closed this

9:00 -. 9:00. Shoe Carnival Sunday hours are 11 - 7. * Note that Shoe Carnival shoe store may vary in closing, opening and sunday hours of operation by state and city. The following Shoe Carnival hours are based on the average store hours nationwide and pertain to most stores. **CL= Closed.

Shoe Carnival Hours of Operation. The following Shoe Carnival hours are based on the average store hours nationwide and pertain to most stores. **CL= Closed.
